required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Cytokine Filter Usage During Open Thoracoabdominal Aortic Aneurysm Repair- a Single-center Randomized Prospective Trial
clinical_study.official_title: Cytokine Filter Usage During Open Thoracoabdominal Aortic Aneurysm Repair- a Single-center Randomized Prospective Trial- Cytosorb and Its Imapct on Open TAAA Repair Outcome

brief_summary.textblock:
Prospecrtive study including 20-30 randomized patients treated by open repair because of an TAAA larger than 55 mm During the surgery, a heart lung machine is applied for distal perfusion during aortic cross clamping to enable distal organ perfusion.
Regardless an intensive inflammatory reaction is a well known effect after reperfusion, leading to a uncontrolled inflammation during th first days after surgery. This may be associated to bad outcome and decreased survival rates. By the application of a intraoperative cytokine and DAMP filter this negative ffect could be reduced, resulting in a better outcome after surgery.

detailed_description.textblock:
Prospecrtive study including 20-30 randomized patients treated by open repair because of an TAAA larger than 55 mm During the surgery, a heart lung machine is applied for distal perfusion during aortic cross clamping to enable distal organ perfusion.
Regardless an intensive inflammatory reaction is a well known effect after reperfusion, leading to a uncontrolled inflammation during th first days after surgery. This may be associated to bad outcome and decreased survival rates. By the application of a intraoperative cytokine and DAMP filter this negative ffect could be reduced, resulting in a better outcome after surgery.

primary_outcome.measure: Amount of perioperative catecholamine usage in mg/dl for the first seven days after surgery
Amount of transfusion required during and after the surgery, assessed in transfusion more or less than 5 blood bags

secondary_outcome.measure: Acute kidney injury, measured using serum creatinine in mg/dl
secondary_outcome.description: AKI assessed according to the KDIGO classification perioperatively for the first 7 days after surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients survival for the first 12 months after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Survival yes/no within the first 12 months after surgery

arm_group.description: Patients suffering from a TAAA larger than 55mm
Patients suffering from a TAAA larger than 55mm

intervention.description: Cytokine filter, which can be used intraoperatively while using a heart lung machine

study_pop.textblock: All patients treated by open TAAA repair

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Suffering from a TAAA larger than 55mm
Exclusion Criteria:
immunosupprive therapy pregnancy
-

responsible_party.investigator_title: Principle Investigator PD Dr. med. Alexander Gombert, Specialist in Vascular Surgery
